name: PinPuck Air Hockey
description:
PinPuck Air Hockey is a combination of two classic arcade games Pinball and Air Hockey. Two player air hockey is combined with the obstacles seen in Pinball games. First player to reach seven wins in a classic duel of red versus blue. Use the arrow keys to move the red player and TFGH to move the blue player. Use the restart button whenever you want to set the scores back to zero.
